outputs.output_descr: Enabling environment for greater accountability to women (and men) by strengthening the national gender equality machinery, including the Equal Opportunities Commission fostered and by strengthening the institutional capacities of the structures ensure gender is mainstreamed in legislation and policymaking processes, subsequently translated into full-fledged implementation, regularly monitored, evaluated and, if necessary, adjusted.

project_descr: Fostering an Enabling Environment for Gender Equality Turkey
project_title: Fostering an Enabling Environ for Gender Equality Turkey
